required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 10, 2022
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A 12-week Extension Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of Brexpiprazole in the Treatment of Subjects With Agitation Associated With Dementia of the Alzheimer's Type
clinical_study.official_title: A 12-week, Multicenter, Active-treatment Extension Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of Brexpiprazole in the Treatment of Subjects With Agitation Associated With Dementia of the Alzheimer's Type

brief_summary.textblock: Active treatment extension study of the 331-14-213 trial, to assess the long-term safety and tolerability of oral brexpiprazole as treatment in adult subjects with agitation associated with dementia of the Alzheimer's type (AAD).

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Frequency and severity of AEs will be reviewed to determine safety and tolerability of brexpiprazole

arm_group.description: Oral tablet; taken once daily. Total daily dose of 2 mg/day
Oral tablet; taken once daily. Total daily dose of 3 mg/day

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject must have participated in the 331-14-213 study.
- Subject must have an identified caregiver who has contact, at a minimum of 2 hours per day, 4 days per week to describe the subject's symptoms and can observe subject behavior.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with a substantial protocol violation during the course of their participation in the double-blind trial 331-14-213.

facility.name: For additional information regarding sites, contact 844-687-8522

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonymized Individual participant data (IPD) that underlie the results of this study will be shared with researchers to achieve aims pre-specified in a methodologically sound research proposal. Small studies with less than 25 participants are excluded from data sharing.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data will be available after marketing approval in global markets, or beginning 1-3 years following article publication. There is no end date to the availability of the data.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Otsuka will share data on the Vivli data sharing platform which can be found here: https://vivli.org/ourmember/Otsuka/
